document_data.name: Silakul
document_data.mainbody: '''Silakul''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in [[Cormanthor]].
document_data.Activities: Silakul was the leader of the Cult cell that assisted [[Dretchroyaster]].
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], the lair of Dretchroyaster was attacked by some adventurers and they defeated Silakul.
document_data.Personality: A cunning and twisted individual, Silakul's goal was to unlock the true power of a [[dracolich]] and use it to increase the Cult's power over the [[Dalelands]].
